item.title: WATCH: Trump visits Federal Reserve amid criticism of Jerome Powell
item.description: The Trump administration says the president's visit to the Federal Reserve was to check the "progress" of a renovation -- and separate from his frustr...

item.title: WATCH: Trailer home swept away by floodwaters in New Mexico
item.description: A home was swept away by floodwaters in New Mexico on Thursday as storm water rushed off mountainsides that have been scarred by wildfire.

item.title: WATCH: Meet the mini horses that give big comfort to hospital patients
item.description: A nonprofit in Southern California is spreading joy with therapy-certified mini horses.

item.title: Police arrest Chuck E. Cheese mascot in front of kids
item.description: A Chuck E. Cheese's mascot has been arrested in Florida after a customer ratted him out as an alleged thief, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Pedro Pascal on 'Fantastic Four' set dance-offs
item.description: The actor tells "GMA" about how the cast bonded on set.
